alert.note: Alert for Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:43AM EDT until April 09 at 12:48PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern New Jersey...including the following county...Warren. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1141 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated flooding occuring due to last night`s heavy rainfall. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Blairstown. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 6 and 10. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
